content: this beautiful heart dishcloth only require about a half or less than a skein to make gauge is not too important here use 100% sport or dk cotton or cotton mixed the heart-shaped dishcloth is knitted from bottom up in garter st pattern with eyelets build-in on the outer edge the pattern work in a mirror effect style and gradually forming a hart shape the top portion is divided into two sections and worked separately to form 2 rounded-shapes for the top of the heart there is also a knitting chart included in the pattern this is a fun quick knit project and make a great valentine gift thanks for letting me share this lovely heart dishcloth knitting pattern with you ratcha from to-knit-knitting-stitches com
